locations.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. locations.name: Planinarski dom Smet
locations.description: Planinarski dom Smet se nalazi na poznatom izletištu Smetovi. Ovo izletište je proglašeno i za jedinstvenu zeničku zračnu banju. Planinarski dom Smet se nalazi na nadmorskoj visini od 964 metara. Dom posjeduje restoran, salu, terasu, igralište, parkove za djecu te prostor za roštilj. Domom upravlja planinarsko društvo Željezara iz Zenice.
